sourcesContent: import { useState } from 'react' import ShoppingBody from './shopping.list.component' const BtnOpenShoppingCart = () => { const [hiddenShopping, setHiddenShopping] = useState('d-none') const handleClick = () => setHiddenShopping(''), handleClickClose = () => setHiddenShopping('d-none') return( <> ) } export default BtnOpenShoppingCart
